name: WILDWESTEST
description:
4P local-multiplayer western shootout where each player aims to become the baddest gunslinger in the Wild West.

One player has a bounty on their head (Wanted) which is rising with every second, while the remaining three players are bounty hunters trying to nail him down. When a hunter kills the Wanted player, he becomes the Wanted instead. Killing hunters when you have a bounty on your head earns you extra money.

Controls: 4 people on two X360 gamepads (each person has to share a gamepad with someone else):

  • move - stick
  • shoot - trigger

Supports 1 gamepad + 1 keyboard as a fallback input method:

  • arrows + numpad return
  • WSAD + space
